CatDescriptText: Allean Powell, 2411 Centre Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 25, 1958, pg. 2 with question: "Do you think there would be less juvenile delinquency if the father were restored to his original role as sole head of the house?" answer reads: "Yes, because I've seen so many broken homes. And they usually come from the father not being the head of the house."
TitMainTitle: Allean Powell wearing dark fur coat and light colored head scarf, standing next to Pittsburgh Courier reporter George Barbour holding steno pad, in front of concrete wall
